about_the_game:
Quest at the Crossroads is a walking simulator that transports the player to a merchant village, located at the crossroads of ancient trading routes. As a mysterious newcomer you are given a list of items to find, in order to get them, you must explore the village and look into all the alleys.

Exploration and Discovery

As a mysterious visitor, you are given a list of items to find - these can be rare goods, everyday trinkets or quirky souvenirs hiding untold stories. To get them, you need to delve into the world of the village, wander the cobbled streets, visit markets and peer into hidden alleys.

Travel without Haste

Quest at the Crossroads doesn't focus on time pressure or competition - instead it encourages slow exploration, careful observation and enjoying the atmosphere. It's an ideal proposition for those who value immersion, non-linear storytelling and exploring the world at their own pace.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 AMD Relative or Higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 or AMD Radeon 6870 HD
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: Game doesn't support VR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bits
  • Processor: Intel i5 AMD Relactive Or Higher
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1050ti with 6GB VRAM / Radeon™ RX 480 with 3GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • VR Support: Game doesn't support VR
